snippet.title: Fractured Sanity VR - Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Fractured Sanity is an immersive VR horror experience with puzzle elements. Waking up in the heart of an infamous mental asylum, you’ll have to fend for your life as you slowly piece together the history of its terrible experiments. Will you reshape yourself into what they want you to become? Or will you be trapped forever?

Fractured Sanity is coming out for Meta Quest, SteamVR and Pico4. With support for English, Spanish, Portuguese and Simplified Chinese.

Wishlist now on Steam: 
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1954840/Fractured_Sanity/

Wishlist now on MetaQuest: 
https://www.oculus.com/experiences/quest/5347273738669610/

Learn more: https://fracturedsanity.unitedgames.com.br/

Join our social media:
https://linktr.ee/unitedgames

#VR #virtualreality #gameplay #horrorgaming #survivalhorrorgaming #survivalgame #puzzlegame #indie #indiegame #indiegamedev #quest2 #quest2gameplay #steamvr #metaquest2 #immersive
